document.masterDocTitle: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution. Palaearctic, introduced to North America ( Skuhrovec 2013 )

Biology. Meadows, bushlands, ruderal habitats. Adults occur in IV–VIII. On Fabaceae (
Trifolium, Chrysaspis , Medicago , Ononis
) (
Nazarenko et al . 1998c
; Mazur 2002 ; Skuhrovec 2005 ).
